definitions: a single line of poetry or a group of lines forming a unit
a numbered subdivision of a chapter in the Bible
examples: The poem's opening verse sets a melancholy tone
Each verse follows a strict rhyme scheme
The minister quoted verse fifteen from Corinthians
She memorized her favorite verses from scripture

definitions: an expression or feeling of disapproval or opposition to something
examples: The lawyer raised an objection to the evidence
Despite objections, the plan moved forward

definitions: any of a large group of organic compounds including sugars and starches that provide energy
examples: Athletes consume carbohydrates before competing for energy
Complex carbohydrates provide sustained energy release

definitions: water in the form of invisible gas produced by boiling
power or energy generated by heated water vapor
examples: Steam rose from the hot coffee cup
The bathroom filled with steam during the shower
The industrial revolution ran on steam power
The old locomotive generated steam for propulsion

definitions: a brief or hurried look at someone or something
examples: She stole a glance at her watch during the meeting
A quick glance revealed nothing unusual

definitions: the part of the face above the eyebrows and below the hairline
examples: Sweat beaded on his forehead during the workout
She brushed her hair back from her forehead

definitions: a structure with a smooth sloping surface for sliding down
a single image in a presentation or photographic transparency
an act of moving smoothly along a surface
examples: Children lined up to go down the slide
The playground featured a spiral slide
The professor clicked to the next slide
Her presentation included twenty slides
The car's slide on ice scared everyone
Baseball players practice their slide into base

definitions: a domesticated ruminant mammal kept for wool, meat, or milk
examples: Sheep grazed peacefully in the meadow
The farmer sheared sheep every spring

definitions: a thick woven fabric covering for floors
examples: The red carpet stretched down the hallway
They installed new carpet throughout the house

definitions: woven or knitted material made from fibers
examples: She wiped the table with a damp cloth
The tailor selected fine cloth for the suit

definitions: the inside part of something, especially a building or vehicle
the inland part of a country or region
examples: The car's interior featured leather seats
They hired a designer to renovate the interior
Explorers ventured into the continent's interior
The interior regions experience extreme temperatures

definitions: the activity or sport of moving rapidly on foot
the action or state of operating or functioning
examples: Running improves cardiovascular health significantly
She goes running every morning before work
The running of the business requires constant attention
Keep the engine running while I check inside

definitions: a set of printed questions used to gather information from respondents
examples: Participants completed the questionnaire anonymously
The health questionnaire asked about lifestyle habits

definitions: the action of leaving, especially to start a journey
examples: Flight departure is scheduled for noon
His sudden departure surprised everyone

definitions: a diagram showing the relation between variable quantities
examples: The graph illustrates population growth over time
Students learned to plot points on a graph

definitions: a person who steals another person's property
examples: The thief was caught on security cameras
A clever thief had picked the lock

definitions: a plant used for flavoring food, medicine, or perfume
examples: Fresh herbs enhance the flavor of any dish
She grows herbs in her kitchen garden

definitions: money granted by the government to assist an industry or business
examples: Farm subsidies help stabilize food prices
The government eliminated subsidies for fossil fuels

definitions: the actors in a play, movie, or show
a rigid protective covering for broken bones
the act of throwing something forcefully
examples: The cast rehearsed for opening night
She joined the cast of the new series
The doctor applied a cast to his broken arm
Signing casts became a school tradition
The fisherman's cast reached the deep water
Each cast of the dice changed their fortune

definitions: the preserved remains or impression of a prehistoric organism in rock
examples: The fossil showed perfectly preserved dinosaur bones
Scientists dated the fossil to millions of years ago

definitions: a group that moves around an area to monitor or protect it
examples: The security patrol checked the building hourly
Border patrol agents work in challenging conditions

definitions: the regular beating of blood through arteries
edible seeds of leguminous plants like beans and lentils
examples: The nurse checked his pulse rate
Athletes monitor their pulse during training
Pulses provide excellent plant-based protein
Dried pulses store well for months

definitions: a person skilled in repairing and maintaining machinery
examples: The mechanic diagnosed the engine problem quickly
She trained as an aircraft mechanic

definitions: large ruminant animals kept on farms for meat or milk
examples: Cattle grazed in the pasture
The ranch raised prize-winning cattle

definitions: a showing of a movie or television program
the testing or examination of people for disease or suitability
examples: The film screening attracted a large audience
Critics attended the advance screening
Cancer screening saves lives through early detection
Job screening includes background checks

definitions: the state or quality of being worthy of honor or respect
examples: She maintained her dignity despite the criticism
Every person deserves to be treated with dignity

definitions: a person regarded as an inspired teacher or proclaimer of God's will
a person who predicts or foretells future events
examples: The prophet delivered messages from God
Ancient prophets guided their communities
Economic prophets warned of the coming recession
She proved to be a prophet of technological change

definitions: a spoken or written discussion explaining or expressing opinions about an event or situation
examples: Sports commentary enhances the viewing experience
Her social commentary appeared in major newspapers

definitions: the extent, width, or area covered by something
a soft food mixture for spreading on bread
examples: The spread of the disease worried health officials
The eagle's wing spread measured six feet
She prepared various spreads for the sandwiches
Peanut butter spread remains a favorite

definitions: a quantity of food suitable for or served to one person
examples: The recipe makes four generous servings
Restaurant servings have grown larger over time

definitions: work assigned to students to be completed outside the classroom
examples: Students spent hours completing their homework
Math homework reinforces classroom learning

definitions: a robot designed to look and act like a human
a mobile operating system developed by Google
examples: The android moved with surprisingly human gestures
Science fiction often features advanced androids
Her Android phone runs the latest apps
Android devices dominate the global market

definitions: the first letter of the Greek alphabet
the dominant individual in a group of animals or people
examples: Alpha is used to denote the first item
Scientists use alpha in mathematical notation
The alpha wolf leads the pack
Alpha personalities often become leaders

definitions: the state of being subject to death or the death rate
examples: Human mortality reminds us to value life
Infant mortality rates have decreased significantly

definitions: the world's largest land animal with a trunk and tusks
examples: The elephant used its trunk to reach high branches
African elephants are larger than Asian elephants

definitions: one of the world's main continuous expanses of land
examples: Africa is the second largest continent
Each continent has unique geographic features

definitions: a quality or feature regarded as characteristic of someone or something
examples: Patience is an important attribute for teachers
The product's best attribute is its durability

definitions: a biological community of interacting organisms and their physical environment
examples: Coral reef ecosystems support diverse marine life
Human activity threatens fragile ecosystems

definitions: authorized absence from work or duty
permission to be absent from work or duty
examples: She took maternity leave for three months
Employees earn paid leave each year
The tree's leaves turned golden in autumn
Rake the leaves before they pile up

definitions: a group of symptoms that consistently occur together indicating a disease or condition
examples: Doctors diagnosed the rare syndrome after extensive tests
The syndrome affects multiple body systems

definitions: the least or smallest amount or quantity possible or required
examples: The job requires minimum experience of two years
Temperature reached the minimum overnight

definitions: the amount of fish or game caught
a device for fastening something such as a door or window
examples: Today's catch included several large tuna
The fishing boat returned with a good catch
The door catch needs adjustment
A simple catch secures the cabinet

definitions: a claim that someone has done something illegal or wrong
examples: The accusation shocked everyone who knew him
False accusations can destroy reputations

definitions: a garment worn on the foot and lower leg
examples: His socks never seem to match
Wool socks keep feet warm in winter

definitions: a small truck with an open back for carrying loads
the act of collecting someone or something
examples: The pickup truck hauled construction materials
Farmers rely on pickups for daily work
Garbage pickup occurs every Thursday morning
Airport pickup is included with the hotel

definitions: a vehicle that travels regularly between two places
a device used in weaving to carry thread
examples: The airport shuttle runs every thirty minutes
Space shuttles revolutionized space exploration
The weaver passed the shuttle through the loom
Traditional shuttles are made from wood

definitions: a mathematical determination of amount or number using given information
examples: Her calculation proved the theory correct
Quick mental calculation impressed the students

definitions: each of the upper and lower bony structures forming the framework of the mouth
examples: The dentist examined her jaw for problems
He clenched his jaw in frustration

definitions: the process of providing or obtaining food necessary for health and growth
examples: Good nutrition supports overall health
The label displays nutrition information

definitions: an experienced person who guides and advises someone with less experience
examples: Her mentor helped navigate career challenges
Young entrepreneurs benefit from having mentors
